title: 5000 Dumps
creator_credit: Stuart Finley, Stuart Finley Productions and United States. Environmental Protection Agency
brief_description: A national survey of solid waste disposal practices revealed “problem” disposal areas. These sites contribute to air and water pollution, and are a health hazard. Visits some of the unsightly dumps throughout the U.S., and describes how they can be eliminated by citizen interest and Government action.
